text_iarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // text_iarchive.hpp

00019 #include <istream>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/archive/basic_text_iprimitive.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/archive/basic_text_iarchive.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00025 
00026 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00027 
00028 namespace boost { 
00029 namespace archive {
00030 
00031 template<class Archive>
00032 class text_iarchive_impl : 
00033     public basic_text_iprimitive<std::istream>,
00034     public basic_text_iarchive<Archive>
00035 {
00036 #ifdef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00037 public:
00038 #else
00039     friend class detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00040     friend class basic_text_iarchive<Archive>;
00041     friend class load_access;
00042 protected:
00043 #endif
00044     template<class T>
00045     void load(T & t){
00046         basic_text_iprimitive<std::istream>::load(t);
00047     }
00048     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00049     load(char * t);
00050     #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00051     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00052     load(wchar_t * t);
00053     #endif
00054     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00055     load(std::string &s);
00056     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00057     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00058     load(std::wstring &ws);
00059     #endif
00060     // note: the following should not needed - but one compiler (vc 7.1)
00061     // fails to compile one test (test_shared_ptr) without it !!!
00062     // make this protected so it can be called from a derived archive
00063     template<class T>
00064     void load_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int){
00065         basic_text_iarchive<Archive>::load_override(t, 0);
00066     }
00067     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00068     load_override(class_name_type & t, int);
00069     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00070     init();
00071     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00072     text_iarchive_impl(std::istream & is, unsigned int flags);
00073     BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00074     ~text_iarchive_impl(){};
00075 };
00076 
00077 // do not derive from the classes below.  If you want to extend this functionality
00078 // via inhertance, derived from text_iarchive_impl instead.  This will
00079 // preserve correct static polymorphism.
00080 
00081 // same as text_iarchive below - without the shared_ptr_helper
00082 class naked_text_iarchive : 
00083     public text_iarchive_impl<naked_text_iarchive>
00084 {
00085 public:
00086     naked_text_iarchive(std::istream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00087         text_iarchive_impl<naked_text_iarchive>(is, flags)
00088     {}
00089     ~naked_text_iarchive(){}
00090 };
00091 
00092 } // namespace archive
00093 } // namespace boost
00094 
00095 // note special treatment of shared_ptr. This type needs a special
00096 // structure associated with every archive.  We created a "mix-in"
00097 // class to provide this functionality.  Since shared_ptr holds a
00098 // special esteem in the boost library - we included it here by default.
00099 #include <boost/archive/shared_ptr_helper.hpp>
00100 
00101 namespace boost { 
00102 namespace archive {
00103 
00104 class text_iarchive : 
00105     public text_iarchive_impl<text_iarchive>,
00106     public detail::shared_ptr_helper
00107 {
00108 public:
00109     text_iarchive(std::istream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00110         text_iarchive_impl<text_iarchive>(is, flags)
00111     {}
00112     ~text_iarchive(){}
00113 };
00114 
00115 } // namespace archive
00116 } // namespace boost
00117 
00118 // required by export
00119 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::text_iarchive)
00120 
00121 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00122 
00123 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
